task.title: Setting up a trace
task.shortdesc: You can set up a trace by using the .

context.p: If IBM Support requests you to set up a trace, they give you information that you must enter on the Web UI Settings page of the .

step.cmd: Click Web UI Settings in the Appliance menu.
Select the Enable trace check box.
Type the string provided by IBM Support in the Trace Specification field.

taskbody.result: IBM Support will run the trace to determine the problem.
taskbody.postreq: After IBM Support has the information they need, return to the Web UI Settings page and clear the Enable trace check box. Then click Save to disable the trace.
